remarks: An element less than or equal to zero equals zero.  ( ~ chle0 analog.) (Contributed by NM, 21-Oct-2011.)
statement:
atl0le.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
atl0le.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
atl0le.z $e |- .0. = ( 0. ` K ) $.
atlle0 $p |- ( ( K e. AtLat /\ X e. B ) -> ( X .<_ .0. <-> X = .0. ) ) $.
